settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Customize your app experience. Manage navigation links, language, and other preferences here.

dashboard.summary_today: Here is your farm's summary for today.

todays_focus.title: Today's Focus
todays_focus.description: Key alerts and conditions for your farm today.
todays_focus.pest_alert_description: Conditions are favorable for aphid infestation in your area. Monitor your crops closely and consider preventative measures.

my_crops.title: My Crops
my_crops.description: Track the growth stages of your crops.

voice_assistant.title: Voice Assistant
voice_assistant.description: Ask me anything about the app or your farm.
voice_assistant.error: Sorry, I am having trouble understanding. Please try again.

calendar.title: Schedule for {date}
calendar.description: Tasks and events for the selected day.
calendar.no_events: No events scheduled for this day.

community.title: Community Forum
community.description: Connect with local farmers, share success stories, and get answers from experts.

consultation.title: Connect with an Expert
consultation.description: Get one-on-one advice from our team of agricultural specialists. Browse available experts below and start a conversation.

crop_recommendations.title: Personalized Crop Recommendations
crop_recommendations.description: Fill in the details about your farm to receive AI-powered crop suggestions tailored to your conditions.

form.farm_details_desc: Provide information about your land and soil.
form.location_details_desc: Tell us where your farm is located.

crop_recommendations.loading: Analyzing your farm data to generate recommendations...

financial_tracker.title: Financial Tracker
financial_tracker.description: Monitor your farm's income, expenses, and overall profitability.
financial_tracker.transactions_description: A log of your recent income and expense activities.

inventory.title: Inventory Management
inventory.description: Keep track of your seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, and equipment.

market_prices.title: Real-Time Market Prices
market_prices.description: Up-to-date prices for various crops from your local 'mandi' markets. Search for a crop to get the latest price.

pest_detection.title: AI Pest & Disease Detection
pest_detection.description: Upload a photo of an affected crop, and our AI will analyze it to identify potential pests or diseases and suggest treatments.

form.upload_instruction: Click to upload or drag & drop an image

form.error_analysis: Failed to analyze the image. Please try again.

toast.title: Analysis Failed
toast.description: There was a problem analyzing your image. Please try another one.

reports.title: Reports & Analytics
reports.description: Track your farm's productivity, soil health, and get yield predictions.
reports.harvests_description: A log of your recent crop harvests and their revenue.

weather.title: Weather & Climate Alerts
weather.description: Live forecast, warnings, and pest alerts for your location.
weather.pest_warning_description: Conditions are favorable for aphid infestation. Monitor your crops closely.
